entry.title: Bitcoin Adoption: Adin Ross Stream Exposes Donald Trump’s Latest Commentary On BTC- Details
entry.summary:
Amid the recent market turmoil that drove Bitcoin to a seven-month low of $49,000, former President Donald Trump engaged with Twitch Streamer Adin Ross in a bid to garner support for a potential re-election campaign in November.
Trump Urges US Government To Hold Bitcoin Reserves
In his speech, Trump emphasized the importance of the United States holding on to its Bitcoin and other crypto reserves, warning that failure to do so could allow China to seize the opportunity, as he has previously cautioned.
The former president highlighted Bitcoin as a modern currency with notable potential, citing individuals within his circle who endorse its value and urging the government to consider its benefits.
Drawing a parallel with artificial intelligence (AI), Trump underscored the necessity…

entry.title: 3rd Largest Bitcoin Miner on Wall Street Boosts BTC Production by 45%
entry.summary:
Despite Bitcoin's (BTC) mixed summer performance, one of Wall Street's largest cryptocurrency miners managed to increase production. Riot Platforms (NASDAQ: RIOT) reported in its latest report a 45% increase in mining to 370 BTC in July. Wall Street Bitcoin Miner Riot Increases Production According to Riot's report published this week, BTC mining in July reached 370 tokens, growing significantly from the 255 reported in June when Bitcoin prices were falling sharply. Although this is 10% less than in July 2023 (410 BTC), considering the average prices from these two periods, Riot would earn much more from the smaller number of Bitcoins mined last month.
Riot Produces 370 #Bitcoin in July 2024 and Expands into Kentucky.“July was a major step forward for Riot, as we inc…

entry.title: Ethereum’s Unexpected Ally: Hacker Channels $40 Million Amid 25% Price Crash
entry.summary:
According to Bloomberg, a wallet linked to a major cryptocurrency heist two years ago swapped $39.75 million worth of the stablecoin DAI to scoop up 16,892 Ethereum (ETH) as the second-largest cryptocurrency plummeted by as much as 23% on Monday.
Crypto Hacker Exploits Ethereum Crash
Per the report, the hacker behind the 2022 attack on the cross-chain bridge protocol Nomad, which resulted in the theft of close to $200 million in crypto, appears to have spotted an opportunity to convert some of their illicit gains into discounted ETH prices.
On-chain data showed that after purchasing ETH, the hacker then moved the tokens in batches of 100 to Tornado Cash, a privacy-focused exchange service that has come under scrutiny by US regulators for its alleged use to launder illicit funds from…

entry.title: Bitcoin Investors Almost Extremely Fearful: Is A Bottom Near?
entry.summary:
Data shows the Bitcoin Fear & Greed Index is right outside the entrance of the extreme greed territory after the latest crash in BTC’s price.
Bitcoin Fear & Greed Index Is Currently Deep Into The Fear Region
The “Fear & Greed Index” is an indicator devised by Alternative that basically tells us about the sentiment the average trader holds towards the Bitcoin and wider cryptocurrency market right now.
This indicator determines the sentiment using data of the following five factors: volatility, trading volume, social media sentiment, market cap dominance, and Google Trends.
To represent this mentality, it makes use of a simple scale that runs from zero to hundred. All values above the 53 mark imply the presence of greed among the investors, while those under 47 suggest fear in the …

entry.title: CoinShares' Q2 2024 Record Revenues Overshadowed by £22M FlowBank Impairment
entry.summary: European digital asset investment firm CoinShares reported financial results for the second quarter of 2024 today (Tuesday), building on the momentum from Q1 and announcing a special dividend following the successful recovery of its FTX claim. However, the report indicates that FlowBank's collapse negatively impacted the company's "principal investments," ultimately consuming the vast majority of total revenues. FlowBank Weighs on CoinShares' Q2 2024 Results The company posted asset management revenue of £22.5 million for Q2 2024, more than doubling from £10.7 million in the same period last year. Total comprehensive income surged to £25.8 million, up from £5.3 million in Q2 2023. Adjusted EBITDA also saw significant growth, reaching £26.6 million compared to £11.4 …

entry.title: Bitcoin Flash Crashes: If Bulls Fail, BTC May Plunge To $40,000
entry.summary:
Bitcoin is falling. Earlier today, the coin crashed to as low as $49,000, a 30% dip from July highs. Even though the coin has briefly retraced, peeling off some losses, the downtrend remains, at least from the candlestick formation in the daily chart. The sharp sell-off of Bitcoin is weighing on the altcoin and crypto markets. At press time, the total crypto market cap, according to CoinMarketCap, is down 15.46% to roughly $1.82 trillion.
Bitcoin At A Precarious Level: Bears Might Force Prices To $40,000
Although the uptrend remains from a top-down preview, one analyst thinks there will be more blood in the coming days if sellers press on.
Taking to X and citing on-chain developments, the analyst noted that since the coin recently dipped 12% lower than the on-chain trader realized…

entry.title: Shiba Inu Petition For Binance To Burn SHIB Tokens Crosses First Milestone
entry.summary:
The Shiba Inu community has launched a petition urging Binance, the world’s largest crypto exchange, to burn SHIB tokens. The petition, which has received an overwhelming response from SHIB supporters, has successfully crossed its first milestone, amassing over 1,000 votes.
Shiba Inu Petition Crosses 1,000 Votes
The Shiba Inu community has taken significant bold steps in its efforts to boost the value of SHIB. On July 17, 2024, the community started a petition, requesting Binance to implement a daily burn mechanism for 1% of all SHIB token transactions.
The Binance petition has garnered a significant amount of support from various community members, exceeding its first milestone by reaching 1,164 votes in just a few weeks. The petition is also nearing 90% of its goal, with just 1…

Polymarket 2024 volumes hit $500m. Elon appearance at Bitcoin Nashville rumoured. Combined SOL, BTC & ETH ETF coming: Geraci. Call skew heads to 2024 extremes in bullish sign. Plan B points to bullish setup in S2F model. Coinbase premium moves back to positive. Gensler likely resigns next year: 10x. Germany already lost $124m profit selling.

entry.title: What's the Meta? Do Crypto Degens Care About Being Scammed?
entry.summary: What's the Meta? With the rise of Pumpdotfun and rug pulls becoming a daily occurrence, why do crypto degens keep investing? Do these investors enjoy being scammed? It appears that people very often invest in meme coins that are very obviously going to rug pull. Once it happens, they just laugh it off on Twitter, is being scammed fun?!

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 162 - SOLANA LEADS THE CHARGE!
entry.summary: BTC ETF Inflows: +$85m. SOL leads majors ahead of ETH ETF. Rumours Trump may want BTC in strategic reserve. Trump BTC round-table tickets going for $845k. Polymarket hits volume record of $20m. ETH ETFs will get steady capital: Binance CEO. Winklevii donate $1m to try and unseat Warren. Tornado sees $1.9bn volume resurgence. New overlay attacks growing in crypto. Messari co-founder faces backlash on views. Raydium integrates with Moonpay. Tencent leads investment round in Chainbase. ZA Bank partners with stablecoin issuers.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 161 - THE BIG WIF COMEBACK?
entry.summary: BTC ETF Inflows: +$53m. Crypto remains stable despite macro sell-off. ETH ETF providers undercut each other on fees. Grayscale keeps 2.5% high fee, launches mini-fund. Grayscale launches ‘Decentralised AI Fund’. Dimon may be ‘changing tune’ on Bitcoin. Many alts now bounced 50-90% from lows. Vote implies 55% of Mt. Gox depositors won’t sell. BlockFi to make creditor distributions this month. WazirX exchanges sees $230m suspected breach. Vitalik warns against voting ‘pro-crypto’. Vitalik & Autism Capital trade barbs. Bitcoin Magazine to hold pro-Trump fundraiser. State Street explore blockchain payments. UPbit sees 44% monthly drop in volume.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 160 - CHATTING TO ROBINHOOD!
entry.summary: BTC ETF Inflows: +$423m. Crypto pushes higher, biggest ETF inflow in 6 weeks. Mt. Gox FUD ‘overestimated’ as whales accumulate. Kraken to begin Mt. Gox repayments in 7-14d. ETH spot ETFs will push ETH to $5k: Bitwise. SOL ETF will be next: Bloomberg. XRP up 35% this week ahead of potential settlement. Aethir reports $36m H1 customer revenue. Craig Wright now under threat of perjury & forgery. FTX & CFTC in $12.7bn settlement. WLD up 40% after delaying unlock schedule. Helio announces instant crypto fiat commerce. Phantom pauses cross-chain swaps amid exploit.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 159 - MEMECOINS GO MAD!
entry.summary: BTC ETF Inflows: +$301m. BTC dips from $65k as $6bn moves from Mt. Gox. Coinbase & MicroStrategy surge with BTC. Genesis sells another $38m BTC. ETH ETF timeline delayed until July 23rd. Trump chooses crypto friendly Vance as VP. Old clip shows Vance bashing Gensler on crypto. Bitcoin is good during debasement: Larry Fink. Michael Dell calls Fink video ‘fascinating’. Fear & Greed index shifts to Greed. Tether mints $1bn USDT on Tron. Stripe expands crypto integration to the EU.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 158 - A WILD WEEKEND FOR BITCOIN
entry.summary: Trump response optimism takes BTC to $63K. Bitcoin whales accumulate most since April 2023. Trump still set to talk at Bitcoin Nashville. ETH ETF approval this week: Geraci. XRP vs SEC press conference rumoured on 18th. Crypto funds saw $1.44B inflows last week. Rumours China is to ‘unban BTC’ in Q4. S. Korea may delay crypto taxes until 2028. Russia to allow crypto trading on stock exchange. All altcoin categories outperform BTC over 7d. BitConnect infamous promoter convicted. Scroll becomes 8th L2 with TVL over $1bn. ETHFI Season 2 claims available this week. Base hits record 1m UserOps in a week.
